post_title: Just posted around 50 t206 for trade
post_content:
In the following thread.  

[url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=295498[/url]

I posted pics of reprints for what I am looking to trade for (i.e what I need to complete the monster) and pictures of the actual cards I have to trade front and back.  Let me know of any interest.  Note I may be out of pocket for a couple days, but I will get back to you as soon as I can.  Thanks much.

Sorry if this isn't the most efficient way to do this.  Let me know if there is a better way.

Another 90 or so cards for trade.  So total around 140 or so for trade.  Have posted what i need - 30ish commons, 30ish HoFers, and a dozen or so southern leaguers.  I have a couple hofs and sls for trade, but mostly commons.
